campaign_name: The Elder Scrolls: Skyrim - Fate Core Campaign
current_objective: Withdraw from Saarthal with the students and the College's notes. Report the Eye of Magnus discovery to Arch-Mage Savos Aren. Keep Ancano boxed into "observer" status.

compel_resolution.atronach_stone_magicka_starved: Accepted compel; spent Magicka potion to clear immediate exhaustion before departure.
compel_resolution.atronach_hunger_eye_siphon: Accepted compel; siphoned the Eye via Staff of Cinders, created Measured Eye Siphon and Eye-Fed Reservoir; Ancano was alerted.

College-Issued Field Kit.notes: Satchel of scrolls, potions, and emergency gear signed out for Saarthal.

Shield-Wall Doctrine.notes: Formation order: Oskern+Onmund front with wards; Brelyna mid support; J'zargo rear artillery. Free invoke spent to coordinate the initial shield surge against the draugr ambush at the chokepoint.

Signed for Their Safety.notes: Mirabelle's directive: you are accountable for student welfare on this expedition.

Measured, Orderly Grit.notes: Voice of the Emperor used at the Saarthal gate to steady the group's nerves and enforce procedure.

Saarthal Resonance Attunement.notes: Oskern keyed to the ruin's ward-hum, letting him feel pressure shifts before they happen.

Ward Reforged in Heat.notes: Oskern blasted back frost buildup with heat, layering the frontline ward; invoked during the Fireball funnel in the chokepoint.

Right Key, Right Now.notes: Boost from ash-salvage: the correct ward-key was found in the sentinel ash (Saarthal Burial Sigil). Boost is spent; the item remains.

Thalmor Overreach Publicly Checked.notes: Oskern and Tolfdir boxed Ancano into observer posture in front of the students.

Ancano's Attention.notes: Ancano is now watching you as a political obstacle, not a student.

Containment Lattice Harmonized.notes: Tolfdir's diagram stabilizes the barrier. A window of safety has been created.

Measured Eye Siphon.notes: A precise, throttled draw. Enough to empower, not enough to rupture.

Eye-Fed Reservoir.notes: A stored charge of Eye energy threaded through the Staff of Cinders into Oskern's matrix.

saarthal_expedition_logistics.name: Saarthal Expedition Logistics
saarthal_expedition_logistics.notes: 1=briefed+supplied; 2=arrive; 3=breach wards + reach Eye chamber; 4=secure exit + return report.

saarthal_expedition_progress.name: Saarthal Expedition Progress
saarthal_expedition_progress.notes: 6/6 means you have reached the Eye chamber. Extraction/withdrawal begins next scene.

hadvar_ralof_rivalry_clock.notes: Ticks during key set-pieces; resolves into kill/capture/turn outcomes.

main_quest_state.timeline_notes: Campaign occurs after Alduin's defeat. Dragon crisis has ended, focus is on civil war and Thalmor conspiracy.

major_choices: Publicly checked Ancano's attempted authority grab at the Eye chamber.

starting_narrative: Oskern Cindershroud begins at the College of Winterhold, already a capable Adept with a famous (and politically loaded) name. The first crisis is local: Tolfdir's expedition to Saarthal and the sealed anomaly beneath it. The civil war remains a looming backdrop—Whiterun is still officially neutral, and both sides pressure Jarl Balgruuf—while the Thalmor maneuver in the shadows.

pc_oskern_cindershroud.line: Snow's falling and you're holding fire like it's a lantern. Show-off... useful, though.
